resource.name: Personal Income Tax Statistics By Zip Code
resource.description: This dataset contains data from California resident tax returns filed with California adjusted gross income and self-assessed tax listed by zip code.  This dataset contains data for taxable years 1992 to the most recent tax year available.

resource.name: Number Of Tax Returns Filed By AGI
resource.description: This dataset contains that the number of tax returns filed within the range of five adjusted gross income classes.
columns_description: Field used to sort AGIC class.
Adjusted gross income classification (AGIC) is the category of taxpayers whose income falls within a specified CA adjusted gross income range.
Taxable year for which tax returns were filed in a number format that can be used to filter and sort, as well as display in charts.
Number of California taxable and nontaxable returns filed for the tax year.

resource.name: CORP Annual Report Excel 2017
resource.description: Excel Summary of the Department's major program activities and statistical profile of California  business taxpayers.

resource.name: PIT Annual Report 2016 Excel
resource.description: Excel Summary of the Department's major program activities and statistical profile of California individual taxpayers
